title: AI-Driven Seismic Tunnel Damage Prediction
description: Developed a deep learning model for predicting tunnel damages and tracking serviceability under seismic conditions using advanced image processing techniques.

title: Earthquake Risk Simulator
description: Python-based simulator combining real-time seismic data and AI for early earthquake warning systems in urban environments.

title: Urban Resilience Dashboard
description: Interactive tool using remote sensing and machine learning to assess vulnerability of urban zones to natural disasters.

title: Multi-hazard Damage Prediction Model
description: Formulated ANN-based model for damage prediction in tunneling projects in earthquake and landslide-prone regions.
